story.title: DocNowCommunity Chat

author.name: DocumentingTheNow
author.bio: tools + community for documenting the now / banner image: Haaaaands Up! Dooooon't Shoot! by Jamelle Bouie https://t.co/94MSbm0gVs…

data.text: These are tweets that were sent as part of the Documenting the Now project's first Twitter chat on July 14th, 2016. The tweets have been curated by which we mean that we've attempted to keep conversations and responses to questions grouped together. This results in the purely chronological flow of the original stream being disrupted in places. You will see some tweets only show up as quotations. This is often because the original tweet was protected and not publicly available. We did seek permission to quote these individuals. We also tried to include replies that did not use the #DocNowCommunity hashtag. Please get in touch if you sent a tweet that you would like to have included. info@docnow.io
